text: Tell me everything you see going on in this picture. This one? Yes ma'am. Oh a little boy is fixing to fall off a stool trying to get a cookie for his sister I guess. And then the mother is washing dishes and her sink is running up her head. .. And she's washing dishes and drying them. .. Can you see anything else going on? I mean there are no right or wrong answers. I just want to be sure you get it. No. Just the water spilling in the floor and . the little boy and girl is fixin' to fall! Trying to get the cookies. Can't see anything going on outside. Yeah. Great. Thank you very
